item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description:
Would the Bittorrent protocol itself be able to profit from your efforts in any way ?
(You've probably been asked this before, what with BitBlinder et al.)

item.title: Sebastian: Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: Sebastian
item.description: Not sure what you're referring to. If you mean bittorrent over Tor, then no, that won't help, unfortunately.

item.title: Sleek (not verified): Comment 3

item.description: Please do you know how I could configure bittorrent to work with tor? thanks in advance
